title: Elegant Diamond Manga Maalai Pendant
materials: G Color). Features a high-quality Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This contemporary pendant showcases a modern take on the traditional 'Manga Maalai' (mango necklace) design. Featuring delicate mango motifs outlined in pave-set diamonds. The intricate diamond setting enhances the brilliance and fire of each stone. The pendant is designed for versatility, easily paired with various chains. Modern twist on South Indian traditional design. It will give that traditional look with a modern style.
occasions: or as an everyday statement piece. It also complements traditional attire for functions like weddings
description: This pendant is a perfect fusion of tradition and modernity, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials. The diamonds sparkle brilliantly against the rose gold, creating a captivating effect. This pendant is a timeless addition to any jewelry collection, representing cultural heritage with a contemporary flair.
